title: Draw this Do that
summary: Intuitively control your life with gestures on your phone and smart watch.
description: Draw this Do thatQuickly perform all manner of activities on your phone just by drawing a symbol!Draw this Do that will enable you to be much more productive by allowing you to draw a simple symbol either on your phone or directly on your smart watch that will then launch any number of useful tasks and utilities.===FINALLY MAKE YOUR SMART WATCH USEFUL===If, like me, you have found your watch being nothing more than a pretty notification centre, then you will be glad to know that things have now changed!Using one of the stylish "Draw this Do that" watch faces, all it takes is one click and then you can draw directly on your watch and launch actions without ever getting your phone out of your pocket. ===Current Features===10 stylish watch faces available if you own an android wear smart watch (a watch isn't required but you will automatically get all of these if you do have one).The ability to put a 'Facebook messenger' style icon over your screen to be even more productive!One touch and one swipe to launch all the below actions.New integration with the Philips HUE home lighting system. Turn you lights on and off and even change color with a swipe of your watch or phone==Current Actions==Affect what is playing...*Volume up*Volume down*Skip Next*Skip Previous*Pause*Play*Full Volume*Mute / UnmuteCall...*A contactOpen...*An app*A websiteTake...*A picture*A selfieToggle...*Wifi*Flashlight*Auto rotate*Bluetooth*Vibrate mode*Silent modeTell me...*How to get to...(navigation)*The time*The weather*My agenda*Travel time to...*This text*What song this is*When the next train is leaving to...Set…*Set alarm*Set timerLock... *My phoneFind...*My phoneControl My Home* Philips Hue integrationMore features are being added all the time!==Use of Administration Privileges==Please Note:If you decide to use the “Remote Locking” feature then you will be asked to provide access to the android.permission.BIND_DEVICE_ADMIN privilege for your phone. This gives administrator rights to your phone but will only be used by this app for the express purpose of remotely locking your phone when you give the defined gesture. This privilege can be removed by uninstalling/reinstalling the app.
descriptionHTML:
Draw this Do that

Quickly perform all manner of activities on your phone just by drawing a symbol!

Draw this Do that will enable you to be much more productive by allowing you to draw a simple symbol either on your phone or directly on your smart watch that will then launch any number of useful tasks and utilities.

===FINALLY MAKE YOUR SMART WATCH USEFUL===

If, like me, you have found your watch being nothing more than a pretty notification centre, then you will be glad to know that things have now changed!

Using one of the stylish "Draw this Do that" watch faces, all it takes is one click and then you can draw directly on your watch and launch actions without ever getting your phone out of your pocket.

===Current Features===

10 stylish watch faces available if you own an android wear smart watch (a watch isn't required but you will automatically get all of these if you do have one).

The ability to put a 'Facebook messenger' style icon over your screen to be even more productive!

One touch and one swipe to launch all the below actions.

New integration with the Philips HUE home lighting system. Turn you lights on and off and even change color with a swipe of your watch or phone

==Current Actions==

Affect what is playing...

*Volume up
*Volume down
*Skip Next
*Skip Previous
*Pause
*Play
*Full Volume
*Mute / Unmute

Call...

*A contact

Open...

*An app
*A website

Take...

*A picture
*A selfie

Toggle...

*Wifi
*Flashlight
*Auto rotate
*Bluetooth
*Vibrate mode
*Silent mode

Tell me...

*How to get to...(navigation)
*The time
*The weather
*My agenda
*Travel time to...
*This text
*What song this is
*When the next train is leaving to...

Set…

*Set alarm
*Set timer

Lock...

*My phone

Find...
*My phone

Control My Home
* Philips Hue integration


More features are being added all the time!

==Use of Administration Privileges==

Please Note:

If you decide to use the “Remote Locking” feature then you will be asked to provide access to the android.permission.BIND_DEVICE_ADMIN privilege for your phone. This gives administrator rights to your phone but will only be used by this app for the express purpose of remotely locking your phone when you give the defined gesture. This privilege can be removed by uninstalling/reinstalling the app.
comments: Amazing Like "tasker for  the Dumbbells ". Simple. Beautiful graphics.
There is nothing else quite like this! This app let's me issue gestures from my watch! A Simple to use interface with premium watch faces! Well worth considering the pro version!!
Brilliant Deceptively simple app which lets you quickly access all your different functions, really easy to understand and useful straight away. Great
recentChanges: **FIX**  App chooser is now working on Android Oreo devices.
**FIX**  Android wear app now always closes back to the watch face if auto close option is selected.
